page.title: 10BENBAIN-1
page.content:
My name is Sarah Loughlin and I live at 'Benbain', Dalmellington. Our house is about 5 kilometres from the school and nearly one kilometre from the road. We live on the side of Benbeoch 330 metres above sea level.
Our house was built at least 200 years ago of large blocks of whinstone and sandstone making the walls about one metre thick. The cottage has been extended and it is now quite a big house with five bedrooms. Originally it was built as a croft or small farmhouse. It was rectangular in shape with a bedroom, dairy or storeroom, living room/kitchen and a byre (cowhouse) all under one roof.
